solution_line_template: One student got {student1_right_questions} questions right because {total_questions} - {wrong_questions} = <<{total_questions}-{wrong_questions}={student1_right_questions}>>{student1_right_questions}

This student's proportion right is {student1_proportion_right} because {student1_right_questions} / {total_questions} = <<{student1_right_questions}/{total_questions}={student1_proportion_right}>>{student1_proportion_right}
This student got a {student1_percentage}% because {student1_proportion_right} x {percent_multiplier} = <<{student1_proportion_right}*{percent_multiplier}={student1_percentage}>>{student1_percentage}

The student got got a {student2_percentage_value}% got {student2_right_questions} right because {total_questions} x {student2_percentage_decimal} = <<{total_questions}*{student2_percentage_decimal}={student2_right_questions}>>{student2_right_questions}

Hannah needs to get {hannah_required_score} questions right because {student2_right_questions} + {score_to_beat_plus_one} = <<{student2_right_questions}+{score_to_beat_plus_one}={hannah_required_score}>>{hannah_required_score}
